channel.title: Ipban help
channel.description: well im using allstar source and it doesnt let me ipban so how do i fix it or ad the code

item.title: Ipban help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“gamma, post:3, topic:238209”]replace your code with this thanks

[code]if (command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 3)) {
try {
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

	if (index != 0) {
			writeLog(v.connectedFrom, "bannedips");
			writeLog(playerName + " IP banned " + victim + ".", "ipbanlogs");
			v.disconnected = true;
			sendMsg("You have sucessfully IP banned "+v.playerName+".");
		} else {
			sendMsg("The person you have tried to IP ban isn't online.");
		}
	} catch (Exception e) {
		sendMsg("An error has occured while attempting to IP ban that player.");
	}
}[/code][/quote]

That’s from Richscape v4.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipban help
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

replace your code with this thanks

[code]if (command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 3)) {
try {
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

	if (index != 0) {
			writeLog(v.connectedFrom, "bannedips");
			writeLog(playerName + " IP banned " + victim + ".", "ipbanlogs");
			v.disconnected = true;
			sendMsg("You have sucessfully IP banned "+v.playerName+".");
		} else {
			sendMsg("The person you have tried to IP ban isn't online.");
		}
	} catch (Exception e) {
		sendMsg("An error has occured while attempting to IP ban that player.");
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
